text: the Blue Flame and the Keepers of the Violet Flame. Many of you reading this book may have hidden soul agree- ments to serve as a Keeper of the Blue or Violet Flames. The Flame Keepers are a specialized soul group that carries the Celestial Silicate Matrix gene code, who incarnate during various time periods to assist the Palaidorians of HU-2 with the human evolutionary process. Flame Keepers possess special- ized genetic codes that will allow them to hold UHF within their bodies to assist Earth with the Stellar Activation process. These writings represent a “wake-up call” to the Flame Keepers, it is time for them to remember their higher calling. Those of you who feel drawn to the concept of the Flame Keepers are likely to be members of the Blue or Violet Flame soul groups. The Keepers of the Blue Flame (Tara’s HU-2, D-5 morphogenetic field) begin and complete their Stellar Activations and Infusions just prior to Earth's Activa- tions and Infusions.
